question_content.description:
### Problem23


In Java, we implement a loop like the following code fragment

``` java
do{
    <Statements>
} while (<Boolean vriable or logical statement> == true) 
```

In Toy, we implement the loop as

yy: Experssions (Leaving 0 in R[1] if _____(0)\___)

--: C 1 _____(1)\___ _____(2)\___

--: Statements

--: C 0 _____(3)\___ _____(4)\___

xx: Statements after the loop
question_content.author: Yantao Mei
